div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxv die Augusti anno
quosupra

the samyne day the aldirman ordanit xlti s' and viij d' to be pait to thomas
prat at the next taxt or ellis to be allouit tile him in his next wattir maile
for wyne and skorcheatis gewin in ane propyne to the chanchlar' and lordis
that come to hald' the ayr' the l xi day of August Instant'

The samyne day Androu branche suorne the gret aith In presens of Nicholl
atkinsone and laurence flemynge tuechinge xiiij bollis Ry Scottis mett half ane
soundis lastRy of Ry et cetera follouit be patrik familton' and nicholl atkinson' apon
the said laurence that the testimoniale gewin vndir his Sele and the sele of Androw
cullane anent the saide matir is leill and trew in ale pontis and the witnes contenit
in it was suorne befor him

Robert blinsele Jonhne colisone and James colisone suorne the gret aithe
deponit thai hed nay thing in fresche mynd anent the said matir

Thomas prat suorne the gret aithe deponit that laurence flemyne sauld'
him demi last of Ry of his gude brothir behalf and he herd say patrik
familtone hed j last of Ry in the schipe ande he herd the merchandis
say he wantit partit of his Ry and the skippar sauld part of Ry to alexander
angousone and he wat nocht gyf he hed ony of his awne

Jonhne blak suorne deponit that the testimoniale gewin vndir the Selis of Androw
branche and Androw Culane is trew and leile and he was present quhen the witnes
contenit in the samyne was suorne and deponit eftir the tenour of the samyn'

The samyn day the aldirman ballieis consale and communite of this burghe gathtreit for the
tyme at the warning of the bell throw the haile towne ordanit thomas
prat and Jonhne Wormet to Sele ane assedacion maid to thomas fyf
with the common' Sell of ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik ane yer'
and tuelf markis in assignacion ane vthir yer' for the termes of xix yeris
eftir the tenor' of the said assedacion' and eftir the tenour and date of the general
assedacion' to be begunnyne at the vigile of Sanct Androw next hereftir

the said day the aldirmane balyes consale and communite grantit and consentit
to formaile wattir and lande tile ony nichtbuyre of the towne for certan
yeris for ane propyne to be gewin to our' Souerane lord extendinge
to lx li'

the saide day the aldirman balyeis consale and communite ordanit grantit and
consentit that the aldirman sere Jonhne ruthirfurd sale haue in asseda
cione ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik and the landis of the tulloche
for xix yeris quhilkis half nethis fischingis was diuisit to Androw
Culan yongar in thar general assedacion now to be gunnyn' at this
next Andirmes day Ande the saide knicht resignit the demi nethis
fischingis of the mydchingile in the townis hande to be disponit
at thar will quhilk was set him in the said generale assedacion
Ande thai ordanit ane letter of tak of the saide half nethis fischingis of the
Raik and the tullouche to be maide vndir the commone to be Selit for
the termes of xix yeris haldinge the date of the forsaide generale assedacion

The samyn day the aldirman balyeis consal and communite has sett and to formaile
lattyne to Androu murray eldar thar comburges the half of al the landis
of schethoysley with thar pertinence with consent and assent of mastir Androw cadiow
for ale the termes of xix yeris entirand' with the samyn at the date of the generale
assedacion maide for xix yeris of thar landis and fyschingis and ordanit ane
letter of tak to be maide to the saide Androw tharapon' vndir the common'
Sele for ane Certane Some vsual money Scotlande for formale
of the saide landis of Schethoysley for the termes of Nyntene yeris pait ande
deliuerit to ane propyne to be gewin tile our' Souerane lordis at his first
cumminge to the towne and in the northt partis

the samyne day the aldirman balyeis Consale ande communite for the cessinge of
trubull ande inquietacion and halding of vnite cherite pece and concorde amange
thame has frely gevin and grantit and assignit ane annuat yerlie portione of
tuelf markis tharof fiwe markis of the malis of Rubislaw sex markis
of thar fleshous' and ane mark of ane butht vndir the tolbutht for the termes
of Nyntene yeris haldinge the date of thar general assedacion vndir the common
Sele of thar landis and wattiris to be pait ane yere to him that is in the saide
generale assedacion of ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik quhilk thomas
fyf breukis and the tothir yer to the saide thomas to be pait And say furtht
the saide tuelf markis yerlie ane yer' to the persone that wantis the half
nethis fishingis and ane vthir yer to the saide thomas his ayris or assignais
Induringe the termes of Nyntene yeris And' grantit ane letter of assignacion
vndir thare common' Sele to be maide herapon'

the samyn day mastir Androu cadiow grantit his expres' consent and assent
to the setting of half the landis of Schethoysley in formalinge to Androw
murray eldar for xix yeris for ane propine to be gevin to the kinge
ande dischargit him of the saide half landis quhilkis was diuisit for him
in thar last generale assedacion and grantit to subscriue his assedacion mad thara
pon

In the balye Court of abirdene haldin in the tolbutht of the samyn the xxvj day
of august the yer' forsaide thomas fyf androw Culan yongar thome of chamer
Patrik rede Androw Wentone alexander angouson' and philp Dunbrek suorne
the gret aith' deponit In presens of batht the partiis that thai vndirstude
the skippar sterisman and alexander angouson' clerk maid sic ane aithe
as in the Certificacion gevin vndir the Selis of Androw branche
and Androw Culane is contenit

the samyn day clays quhit skippar of the bus' fynde ane borghe' in the handis
of thomas Jamesone seriand that the merchandis contenit in his chartir party
wranguislie haldis his fraucht fra him

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die
mensis Augusti anno quo supra

the samyn day the Court wardit that Walter atkin suld ansuer' to the borghe'
strekit apone him be Dauid matheson' for the wranguis' halding fra him of
compt rekning and pament of the gudis that he hed say far as pertenit
tile his wyf becaus' he clede the court and deneyt the clame

the samyn day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Jonhne Kintor
tile ansuer' tile the borghe' strekit apone him be Androu Culan yongar
for the wranguis' haldinge fra him of xxxvi s'

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas fyf talismane
that Wat atkin sal gyf compt rekning and pament to Dauid matheson'
of the gudis that he hade sayfare as pertenis to the saide Dauid wyf becaus'
he has entirit in pament to the saide Dauid obefor of the samyne gudis

the samyn tyme the assis' grantit to comper' ale or the mast part one monunday
one that next cumis to determe the clame and debate betuix Robert chamer and Wat
atkin but ony langar delay fraude or delatoure

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem mariote lowsone
div.p:
Andreas Wentone Willelmus gareache senior Willelmus andirsone senior thomas
prat Robertus buchane Johannes Westlande magnus Wormet thomas cullan
Donaldus strathachin patricius rede alexander angouson' Richardus hill Junior
Dauid mathesone Andreas Waus murthacus glenmaluyn Jacobus crage gilbertus
gareache Willelmus nory et Dauid spens qui jurati dicunt quod mariote louson'
est legittima et propinquior heres quondam Dauid lousone fratris suj et est legittime etatis et
Idem Dauid obiit ad fidem et pacem Regis

div.head:
Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem agnetis broysour
margarete broysour mariorie broysour et cristine coupar
div.p:
Thomas fyf Andreas Wentone Williame gareauche senior Willelmus andirson' senior
thomas prat Dauid mar' Robertus buchan Johannes Westlande magnus Wormet
thomas Culan Dauid Kintor Donaldus strathechin patricius rede alexander angouson'
Richardus hill Junior Dauid mathesone et Alexander Waus Jurati dicunt
quod quondam gilbertus broysour frater agnetis broysour margarete broysour et mariorie broysour ac
auunculus cristine coupar obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente in futy inter terram quondam findelay fores
ex australi ex vna et terram Willelmj harpar ex boreali partibus ex altera extenden'
a torrente de Dee versus occidens ad le linkis siue maris litus versus oriens et quod
dicte quatuor mulieres et damicelle sunt legittime et propinquiores heredes dicti quondam gilberti et quod
sunt legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro in libero
burgagio et quod dicta terra valet per annum viginti s' et valuit tempore pacis et nunc librum
tenementum eiusdem existit in manibus margaret heruy matris dicti gilberti

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio pennultimo die mensis Augusti Anno
quo supra

Thomas farchar' one that ane part Ande Dauid spens and Wat
atkin one that vthir part ar oblist and bindin be the fathtis of thar bodiis to
stande and abide at the deliuerance ordinance and decret of thar personis vndir writin that
is to say thomas fyf Androw branche James colison' murthow glenmaluyn
and William blinsele amicabile compositouris and summissouris chosin betuix tham anent
al clames controuersiis and debatis
detabile debatabile betuix thame

The samyne day comperit Williame quelp and cristiane turinge his spous'
befor the aldirman balyeis ande diuers' of the consale ande communite gathtret
for the tyme warnit be the hand' bell throw the haile towne Ande
present thaim ane letter of our Soureane lordis vndir the Signet and manuale sub
scription' the quhilk follouis Weilbelouet frendis we gret you wele
hartlie weile And' forasmekile as our louet seruitouris William quelp and
cristiane turinge his spous' has in tak of you a certane fischinge of
the wattir of Done Ande now we ar Informit that ye attend' tile set
the saide fischinge fra our saide seruitouris herfor we exhort and prays
you richt effectuouslie that ye prolonge thar takkis and mak new asseda
cion' to thaim for our saik thai payand tharfor sicklik maile as thai pait obe
fore Ande this ye do as ye will do vs singular' emplesour And' as ye
will we do for you in gretar materis in tyme cumyne And' god
keipe you writin vndir our Signet at strabogy the xxiiij day
of august James R' / the quhilk letter beinge rede seyne and
vndirstandin' opinly grantit and consentit that the saidis Williame
and cristiane sale haue the said fishingis at our Souerane lordis command'
sene it was the first request that euire thai war' chargit witht
be his hienes

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas fyf talisman
that Wat atkin sal pay to Robert of chamer xlv s' of fre Siluer

In the balye Court of abirdene haldin in the tolbutht of the samyn the
last day of August the yer forsaide thomas Jamesone seriand' at the
commavnd' of the ballieis chargit Duncan lammynton' be his wand to
remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait to Jonhne of Ketht assignay in
that part to Ranald' Dys' foure lib' and vij s' optenit one him be the ak mad
tharapone obefore

the samyne day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Wat atkin
to ansuer' peremptourlie tile the borghe' strekit apone him be Androw
Waus that he wrangis in the vnfullinge of the bill of compt and rekning
of certane gudis sende with him in Danskin' be the saide Androw

The thrid part day of September' the yer forsaide Duncane
of lammyntone fand' Androw lousone Souerte be his handis and gudis to
the aldirman that the said Duncan sall ples' Jonhne of Ketht assignay to
Ranald' of Dys' in that part of iiijor li' and vij s' optenit one him And' falye
and' tharof the saide Androw sal entir the said Duncan agane in the tolbutht thar'
to remane quhile he pait the saide Some within aucht dais in sic fassone as
he was chargit to remane obefore

In the balye Court of Abirdene haldin in the tolbutht of the samyne the thride day
of September the yer' forsaide mastir Androw cadiow one that ane part And' Jonhne
bogy baxtar one that vthir parte ar oblist be thar handis to stand' at the ordinance and
deliuerance of Jonhne menyeis Williame blinsele sere Jonhne stirueling and Williame
goldsmitht anent the avale of ane gold Ringe with ane saffer' and the pament of It

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' thomas fyf talisman
that Wat atkin sale pay to Robert of chamer alevin merkis half
ane merk and v s' of lubysmoney of his malt tar meile and lent siluer
the xlv s' optenit obefor' apone the said Walter allouit tharintill quhilkis
extendis to iiijor li' xiiij s' and vj d' fre siluer

the saide day the borghe strekit be Androu Waus apon' Wat atkin
that he fulfillit nocht his bill of compt and rekning is fundin of vale
for the quhilk the saide Walter was in ane Amerciament of the court

The saide day Alexander rede grantit that he sulde ger thome Waus be
pait of the gudis promittit to him be Will gregory within xv dais
gyf he appontis nocht with his gude modir

Eodem die Alexander Rolland' fecit constituit et ordinavit thomam fyf suum procu
ratorem legittimum in omnibus suis placitis et actionibus in vberiore forma
procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera

The sext day of September' the yer forsaide In presens of the aldirman
and diuers' of the consale Alexander chamer of murchile dischargit merk scot of
the maile of ane quartar nethis fischingis of the midchingile of this yer'
bigan

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo die
septembris Anno quo supra

the samyne day Walter atkin allegit that the gudis that Dauid mathoson
follouit him of was testit gudis quharfor he protestit quhat the balyeis
dide tharto sulde turne him to nay preiudice

the ferd day of September' forsaide Williame nory cum dettour' be his hande
landis and gudis to pay Androw branche iij li' and xxxti d' of the rest of
ane mair' Some optenit apone him Walter atkin' within terme of law

In the balye court of abirdene haldin in the tolbutht of the samyn the xxij day
of Septembere the yer forsaide Jonhne colisone was fundin quyt be
ane assis' of ane barrele of Salmond' follouit be hary collinwode Inglisman

the samyne day the balyeis ordanit and assignit Wat atkin to gyf compt
rekning and pament one friday that next cumis as day of peremptour to Androw
Waus eftir the tenor' of his paper

In the balye court of abirdene haldin in the tolbutht of the samyn the xxiiij
day of September the yer forsaide

the samyn day Williame philpe grantit him awand' to alexander Rolland'
tene pundis Scottis money to compt and rekning for a land' bocht
fra him

The samyn day Williame philp schew how he was constrenyeit
to mak haile pament to alexander rollande for the lande bocht fra him
and askit the half Some at Walter atkin promittit for the saide lande
obefor and offerit him redy to putt him in possession' of the half
of the saide lande in continent Ande sene he coude gett nay pament
fra the saide Walter he protestit It sulde turne him to nay preiudice
nay he micht breuk the saide haile lande and be quyt of the saide
Walteris clame in tyme to Cum

the samyne day Wat atkin askit William philp to putt him in
state of half the lande bocht alexander rolland' and he suld pay him
tharfor eftir the tenor of thar condicion maide betuix thame tharapon'

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid menyeis eldar
forspekar that Androu branche sal pay to Dauid spens the fraucht
of j barrell of meile

The last day of September' the yer forsaide In presens of Jonhne
menzeis and William blinsele tua of the balyeis lindesay harrald grantit
him awande to Dauid menyeis eldar tua barrellis of Salmond'
merchand gude of the richtuis' bind' of abirdene to be pait him at the
next fischingis hereftir Nocht withstandinge gif the saide lindesay his
ayris executouris or assignez' pais to the saide Dauid his ayris executoris
or assignez thretty s' vsual money of Scotlande be yule next eftir
follouing he is dischargit of ane of the saide barrellis of Salmonde
And' gif he or thai pais him his ayris or assignez' vthir xxxti s' be
fourty dais eftir the next Witsonday he is dischargit of the tothir
barrele of Salmond'

Eodem die Johannes Knollis fecit constituit creauit et nominavit Johannem colisone
and Johannem moir' coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum quandam
terram penitus vastum Jacentem in vico furcarum et vno annuo Redditu
x s' Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis promitten' de Rato
et grato

In presens of the aldirman and William blinsele balye Androw murray
eldar and Walter auchneywe ande sere Jonhne stirueling toune borghe'
and hamhald' to Androw louson' and thome narne for xvj oxin' bocht
ande resauit be tham fra William Walcar mair' of fee of Kincardin'
at commawnd of ane nobile and michtie lord William erle marschele
